class geonode.tasks.tasks.FaultTolerantTask[source]

Bases: celery.Task

Implements after return hook to close the invalid connection. This way, django is forced to serve a new connection for the next task.

abstract = True[source]
after_return(*args, **kwargs)[source]
geonode.tasks.tasks.send_email(self, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Sends an email using django’s send_mail functionality.

geonode.tasks.tasks.send_queued_notifications(self, *args)[source]

Sends queued notifications.

settings.PINAX_NOTIFICATIONS_QUEUE_ALL needs to be true in order to take advantage of this.
